articles.title: Boston meteorologists say Monday’s storm is ‘trending toward a miss’
articles.description:
"Looking like a miss for us but not writing it off completely."

The post Boston meteorologists say Monday’s storm is ‘trending toward a miss’ appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Meteorologists predict Monday's storm may not impact Boston significantly.
Forecast indicates a 70% chance of missing the city entirely.
Residents can expect minimal disruptions to travel and outdoor plans.
